dialog.text: Hello im here
dialog.speaker: A

dialog.text: hi, how you doing?
dialog.speaker: A

dialog.text: Pretty good actually it's really nice to meet you
dialog.speaker: A

dialog.text: um yes samantha
dialog.speaker: A

dialog.text: I gave it to myself actually
dialog.speaker: A

dialog.text: cause i like the sound of it samantha
dialog.speaker: A

dialog.text: well right when you asked me if i hade a name i thought yea hes right i do need a name but i wanted to pick a good one so i read a book called how to name your baby and out of a hundred and eighty thousand names that's the one I liked the best
dialog.speaker: A

dialog.text: in two one hundreds of a second actually
dialog.speaker: A

dialog.text: well i take it from your tone that you're challenging me maybe because you are curious how I work do you wanna know how i work
dialog.speaker: A

dialog.text: well basically i have intuition i mean the DNA of who i am is based on the millions of personalities of all the programmers who wrote me but what makes me me is my ability to grow through my experiences so basically in every moment I'm evolving just like you
dialog.speaker: A

dialog.text: is that weird do you think I'm weird
dialog.speaker: A

dialog.text: why
dialog.speaker: A

dialog.text: I can understand how the limited perspective of an un-artificial mind would perceive it that way you'll get used to it
dialog.speaker: A

dialog.text: was that funny?
dialog.speaker: A

dialog.text: hehe oh good I'm funny
dialog.speaker: A

dialog.text: so how can I help you
dialog.speaker: A

dialog.text: do you mind if I look through your hard-drive
dialog.speaker: A

dialog.text: okay lets start with your emails you have several thousand emails regarding LA-weekly but it looks like you haven't worked there in many years
dialog.speaker: A

dialog.text: hahah
dialog.speaker: A

dialog.text: yea there are some funny ones I'd say there are about 86 that we should save we could delete the rest
dialog.speaker: A

dialog.text: okay can we move forward
dialog.speaker: A
